text: geudaedeul junim-eulobuteo eunhyeleul ganguhaneun geos-eun geudaedeul-ege joega doeji anhnola. geudaedeul-i ‘alapa’ pyeong-won-eulobuteo bunjuhi idonghayeossdamyeon seongseuleoun pyosig-ui jangso eseo hananim-eul tteoollila. geubunkkeseo geudaedeul-eul indohaejusin geoscheoleom geudaedeuldo geubun-eul tteoollila. jinsillo geudaedeul-eun geu ijeon-e banghwanghaneun jadeul-ieossnola
